info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 2:06PM MST until July 31 at 4:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 400 PM MST. * At 206 PM MST, A thunderstorm was producing heavy rain south of Willow Beach on the western side of Highway 93 in Mohave County. Additionally, storms were beginning to develop between Dolan Springs and Valentine potentially impacting Piece Ferry, Stockton Hill, and Antares Point Roads over the next hour. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads, Grand Canyon Ranch, Dolan Springs, Packsaddle Campground, Windy Point Campground, Meadview, Temple Bar Campground, Temple Bar and Peach Springs. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
